title: Implement Pattern Matching Engine
description: Create scripts/pattern-matcher.py for fast keyword-based pattern suggestion from error catalog. Match task descriptions to relevant patterns and common errors.
notes: Functions: match_patterns(), suggest_errors(), calculate_relevance_score(). 10x faster than LLM reading entire catalog. Useful for suggesting patterns when breaking down complex tasks.
assumptions: Relevance scoring based on TF-IDF or similar
decision_rationale: Pattern matching helps prevent common errors and suggests proven solutions. Fast keyword matching reduces LLM token usage.
